content: #CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin" As CORE is intended to be a multi-layer blockchain as well as a layer 0 blockchain, the CORE team is developing all necessary tools and SDKs for developers to create their own blockchains with limitless use cases. They can be used for whatever the programmer wants, whether it's data validation, digital currency wrapping, minting cryptocurrencies, or building blockchains.The following engines are the building blocks of a fully scalable and secure blockchain: Cryptography Engine, Consensus Engine, State Engine, Randomizer Engine, Tokenizer Engine, State Sync Engine. "This is a description of CORE by one of the project programmers, Is it possible to create this engines?https://twitter.com/COREMultichainhttps://coremultichain.com#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CATENA_Network#CMCX_CoinCORE-MultiChain ProjectCMCX Coin

comments.body: #CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CATENA_Network#CMCX_CoinReplay me to receive CMCX coins and have a transaction experience on DejaVuTestNetTo add the CORE MultiChain’s Deja-Vu TestNet network to your wallets, please follow the below steps:For Metamask Wallet users:1. Go to the Explorer's website (https://dejavu-testnet.coremultichain.com/);2. Open the sidebar menu (top right of the page);3. Click on “Add" button.*You can also enter the network configuration details manually to your Metamask wallet, using the following information:Network Name:CORE Multichain Deja vu TestNetNew RPC URL:https://testnet-rpc.coremultichain.net/Chain ID:2122Currency symbol:CMCXBlock explorer URL:https://dejavu-testnet.coremultichain.com/==========================For CORE Wallet users:0. download the new version of CORE-MultiChain wallet: https://wallet.coremultichain.com1. In Home Page, click on the “Add Token" button;2. scroll down and select “CORE MultiChain Testnet” and click on “Add Token”.#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin#CATENA_Network#CMCX_Coin
